ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( FieloEE__IdentificationType__c , 'CPF' ) , NOT( OR( LEN( FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c ) = 0, AND( LEN(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c) = 14, CONTAINS("0123456789", LEFT(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 1)), CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 2, 1)), CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 3, 1)), MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 4, 1) = ".", CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 5, 1)), CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 6, 1)), CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 7, 1)), MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 8, 1) = ".", CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 9, 1)), CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 10, 1)), CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 11, 1)), MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 12, 1) = "-", CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 13, 1)), CONTAINS("0123456789", MID(FieloEE__IdentificationCode__c, 14, 1)) ))))
